
4 - 5 =-1
4 + 5 =9
4 * 5 =20
298 - 181 =117
298 + 181 =479
298 * 181 =53938
15 + 187 =202
15 - 187 =-172
15x^20 + 187 =187+15x^20
15x^20 * 187 =2805x^20
15x^20 - 187 =15x^20-187
-1+5x+0+1 + 0+1 =5x+1
-1+5x+0+1 - 0+1 =5x-1
-1+5x+0+1 * 0+1 =5x
50x^20y^40 * 20x^20+60 =3000x^20y^40+1000x^40y^40
50x^20y^40 - 20x^20+60 =50x^20y^40-20x^20-60
